snippet: For 146 years the hospital on the West Side of Manhattan was called Roosevelt Hospital, but the Mount Sinai Health System, into which the hospital merged two years ago, has renamed it, a change that has upset some Roosevelt family members.
abstract: Renaming of Mount Sinai West hospital in Manhattan from Mount Sinai Roosevelt Hospital drew objections from Roosevelt family members; renaming is outgrowth of merger of Roosevelt Hospital with Mount Sinai Health System, which has said renaming is part of rebranding effort for company.
lead_paragraph: For 146 years the hospital on the West Side of Manhattan was called Roosevelt Hospital, but the Mount Sinai Health System, into which the hospital merged two years ago, has renamed it, a change that has upset some Roosevelt family members.

headline.main: Mount Sinai Sheds Roosevelt Name as Hospital Moves On
headline.print_headline: A Famous Name Falls as a Hospital Moves On
